LanguageData.PRFXCompositeTile.label: X-Composite tile
LanguageData.PRFXCompositeTile.description: X-Composite tiles engraved with intricate patterns. They are incredibly beautiful. Perfect for showing off as a glitterworld quindecillionaire.
LanguageData.PRFYCompositeTile.label: Y-Composite tile
LanguageData.PRFYCompositeTile.description: Y-Composite tiles. Much less beautiful than X-Composite but easier to build, and offers a great boost to cleanliness.
LanguageData.PRFZCompositeTile.label: Z-Composite tile
LanguageData.PRFZCompositeTile.description: Z-Composite tiles engraved with 3-d holograms. Ludicrously beautiful and offers moderate cleanliness.
LanguageData.PRFFloorComputer.label: Floor computer
LanguageData.PRFFloorComputer.description: Fearsome-looking blinking lights embedded into the floor. Ridculously expensive. Provides moderate beauty. I wonder what these are even used for...
